PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-12732010-10-21TC,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Shipping Act, 2001
SubjectRegulations Amending the Vessel Operation Restriction Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the VESSEL OPERATION RESTRICTION REGULATIONS, in order to correct errors and thus more clearly specify the bodies of water affected by the Regulations; to ensure, where conditions warrant, the Regulations are amended so they are no more stringent than is necessary to enhance the safety of navigation or to protect the environment or the public interest; and to provide relevant and practical methods of ensuring compliance.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2010-0226 Publication Date: 2010-11-10
AttachmentsAttachment
